titleStmt.title: Episcopacie not abivred in His Maiesties realme of Scotland containing many remarkable passages newly pvblished, the contents of the severall chapters follow in the next page.
titleStmt.author: Maxwell, John, 1590?-1647.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Maxwell. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Running title: Episcopacie not abjured in Scotland.
Reproduction of original in Trinity College Library, Dublin.
